Identification_Area.title: Chandrayaan-2 Orbiter CLASS Data Archive Products Bundle

Citation_Information.description: Chandrayaan-2 Orbiter CLASS Payload Data Products Bundle

Modification_Detail.description: Release 38 of CLASS data products. This is an incremental release with initial version of data for the duration 2024-06-01 to 2024-06-30
Release 37 of CLASS data products. This is an incremental release of CLASS L2 files v2 (elemental maps) for Al, Fe, Mg, Na, Si.
Release 36 of CLASS data products. This is an incremental release with initial version of data for the duration 2024-05-01 to 2024-05-31
Release 35 of CLASS data products. This is an incremental release with initial version of data for the duration 2024-04-01 to 2024-04-30
Release 34 of CLASS data products. This is an incremental release with initial version of data for the duration 2024-02-01 to 2024-03-31
Release 33 of CLASS data products. This is an incremental release with initial version of data for the duration 2023-12-01 to 2024-01-31
Release 32 of CLASS data products. This is an incremental release with initial version of data for the duration 2023-11-01 to 2023-11-30
Release 31 of CLASS data products. This is an incremental release with initial version of data for the duration 2023-10-01 to 2023-10-31
Release 30 of CLASS data products. This is an incremental release with initial version of data for the duration 2023-09-01 to 2023-09-30
Release 29 of CLASS data products. This is an incremental release with initial version of data for the duration 2023-08-01 to 2023-08-31
Release 28 of CLASS data products. This is an incremental release with initial version of data for the duration 2023-07-01 to 2023-07-31
Release 27 of CLASS data products. This is an incremental release with initial version of data for the duration 2023-06-01 to 2023-06-30
Release 26 of CLASS data products. This is an incremental release with initial version of data for the duration 2023-05-01 to 2023-05-31
Release 25 of CLASS data products. This is an incremental release with initial version of data for the duration 2023-04-01 to 2023-04-30
Release 24 of CLASS data products. This is an incremental release with initial version of data for the duration 2023-02-01 to 2023-03-31
Release 23 of CLASS data products. This is an incremental release with initial version of data for the duration 2023-01-01 to 2023-01-31

Release 22 of CLASS data products. This is an incremental release with initial version of data for the duration 2022-12-01 to 2022-12-31. In addition, CLASS L2 files v1 (elemental maps) for Al, Fe, Mg, Na, Si released
Release 21 of CLASS data products. This is an incremental release with initial version of data for the duration 2022-11-01 to 2022-11-30
Release 20 of CLASS data products. This is an incremental release with initial version of data for the duration 2022-10-01 to 2022-10-31
Release 19 of CLASS data products. This is an incremental release with initial version of data for the duration 2022-09-01 to 2022-09-30
Release 18 of CLASS data products. This is an incremental release with initial version of data for the duration 2022-08-01 to 2022-08-31
Release 17 of CLASS data products. This is an incremental release with initial version of data for the duration 2022-05-01 to 2022-05-31
Release 16 of CLASS data products. This is an incremental release with initial version of data for the duration 2022-02-01 to 2022-04-30 and 2022-06-01 to 2022-07-31
Release 15 of CLASS data products. This is an incremental release with initial version of data for the duration 2021-09-01 to 2021-11-30
Release 14 of CLASS data products. This is an incremental release with initial version of data for the duration 2021-08-01 to 2021-08-31
Release 13 of CLASS data products. This is an incremental release with initial version of data for the duration 2021-04-01 to 2021-07-31
Release 12 of CLASS data products. This is an incremental release with initial version of data for the duration 2021-02-01 to 2021-03-31
Release 11 of CLASS data products. This is an incremental release with initial version of data for the duration 2020-10-01 to 2021-01-31
Release 10 part 2 of CLASS data products. In this release, an XRF model is included in the 'miscellaneous' collection
Release 10 of CLASS data products. This is an incremental release with initial version of data for the duration 2020-09-01 to 2020-09-30
Release 9 of CLASS data products. This is an incremental release with initial version of data for the duration 2020-07-01 to 2020-08-31
Release 8 of CLASS data products. This is an incremental release with initial version of data for the duration 2020-06-01 to 2020-06-30
Release 7 of CLASS data products. This is an incremental release with initial version of data for the duration 2020-05-01 to 2020-05-31
Release 6 of CLASS data products. This is an incremental release with initial version of data for the duration 2020-04-01 to 2020-04-30
Release 5 of CLASS data products. This is an incremental release with initial version of data for the duration 2020-02-01 to 2020-03-31
Release 4 of CLASS data products. This is an incremental release with revised data for the duration 2020-01-01 to 2020-01-31
Release 3 of CLASS data products. This release contains revised data for the period September 2019 to December 2019 which were originally part of release 1 and 2
Release 2 of CLASS data products for the period November 2019 to January 2020
Release 1 of CLASS data products for the period September 2019 to October 2019

Observing_System_Component.name: Chandrayaan-2 Large Area Soft x-ray Spectrometer
